name: Eldorado Resort Casino – AT THE ROW
description: The Eldorado Resort Casino Reno is a rare mix of upscale atmosphere with a relaxed vibe right in the heart of Reno. Boasting nine award-winning restaurants, unlimited nightlife, a showroom featuring Cirque-style productions, and luxurious accommodations across three towers.
shortDescription: Upscale downtown Reno casino resort with 9 restaurants and 15 room types across 3 towers.
highlights: Connected to Silver Legacy & Circus Circus

roomTypes.name: Virginia Petite Room (1 Queen)
roomTypes.description: Compact room in the Virginia Tower.

roomTypes.name: Skyline Superior Room (1 King)
roomTypes.description: Standard king in the Skyline Tower.

roomTypes.name: Sierra Luxury Room (1 King)
roomTypes.description: Luxury king in the Sierra Tower.

roomTypes.name: Sierra Studio Suite (1 King)
roomTypes.description: 500 sq ft studio with living area, dining for four, wet bar.

roomTypes.name: Sierra Executive Suite (1 King)
roomTypes.description: One-bedroom suite with separate living room and bar.

roomTypes.name: Skyline Player Spa Suite
roomTypes.description: Spa suite with in-room spa amenities.

dining.name: Ringside Bar
dining.description: Sports bar near the casino floor.

parking: Free parking in Silver Legacy garage

faqs.question: How many room types does Eldorado have?
faqs.answer: 15 room types across three towers — Virginia, Skyline, and Sierra — from compact petite rooms to full spa suites with in-room whirlpool tubs.

faqs.question: Is Eldorado connected to other casinos?
faqs.answer: Yes — Eldorado is part of THE ROW, connected to Silver Legacy and Circus Circus via enclosed skywalks in downtown Reno.

faqs.question: Does Eldorado offer golf packages?
faqs.answer: Yes — Golf the High Sierra creates custom packages with Eldorado lodging and tee times at 20+ Reno-Tahoe courses. Call 888-584-8232.

meta.title: Eldorado Resort Casino Reno | AT THE ROW Golf Packages
meta.description: Stay at Eldorado in downtown Reno. 15 room types, 9 restaurants, and custom golf packages with 20+ courses.

testimonials.quote: Stayed at Eldorado Resort Casino – AT THE ROW for our golf trip and it was the perfect home base. Rooms were clean and spacious, location was ideal for hitting courses around Reno. GTHS got us a group rate we couldn't find anywhere else.
testimonials.author: Laura S.

testimonials.quote: Our conference group of 40 stayed at Eldorado Resort Casino – AT THE ROW. Meeting rooms were perfect, the rooms were comfortable, and being in Reno meant we could add golf days to the agenda. GTHS made the whole package seamless.
testimonials.author: Scott G.

testimonials.quote: Eldorado Resort Casino – AT THE ROW is an ideal spot for a golf getaway in Reno. Close to great courses, good restaurants on-site or nearby, and the rooms have everything you need. GTHS knows exactly which room blocks to reserve for groups.
testimonials.author: Nick S.
